definition: non-Han people, esp. to the East of China/barbarians/to wipe out/to exterminate/to tear down/to raze
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: A nomadic group in the plain has been exterminated by a band of foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 草原上的一支游牧民族被一帮外族人夷灭了。

definition: to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
to execute the whole family and confiscate their property
to involve others (in a crime)/guilt by association
to tear off a person's four limbs and head using five horse drawn carts (as capital punishment)/to tear limb from limb
to plot a rebellion/to conspire against the state
to commit suicide on the orders of a sovereign (old)
an execution/to put sb to death
extermination of an entire family (ancient Chinese punishment)
